q: Across the nation there's a feeling of defiance among politicians. They are undeterred by the violence that erupted at Gabrielle Giffords ' political event in Tucson, Ariz., on Jan. 8, 2011. I think right now she is inspiring all of us, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.).`` I think she is inspiring our nation with her courage, with her strength.'' . Richard Hunter didn't get a response from the NFL star. But he did get a surprise at the same event when Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway presented Michael Vick with a key to the city. People are going to think that the city- in the week that the eyes of the world were on us- gave the key to the city to a sociopath like that, Richard Hunter said.
